TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCookie extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供型別安全 (Type-Safe) 方式來建立並操作個別 HTTP Cookie。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to create and manipulate individual HTTP cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別取得及設定個別 cookie 的屬性。The class gets and sets properties of individual cookies. 類別提供方法來儲存、 擷取及管理多個 cookie。The class provides methods to store, retrieve, and manage multiple cookies. ASP.NET 包含兩個內建 cookie 集合。ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections. 透過存取的集合的集合物件包含傳輸中的伺服器的用戶端的 cookie`Cookie`標頭。The collection accessed through the collection of the object contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header. 透過存取的集合的集合物件包含在伺服器上建立並傳輸至用戶端中的新 cookie `Set-Cookie` HTTP 回應標頭。The collection accessed through the collection of the object contains new cookies created on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` HTTP response header. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查名為 cookie`DateCookieExample`在物件。The following code example demonstrates how to check for a cookie named `DateCookieExample` in the object. 如果找不到 cookie，則會建立並新增至物件。If the cookie is not found, it is created and added to the object. Cookie 會設定為在 10 分鐘後到期。The cookie is set to expire in 10 minutes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookie/cs/HttpCookie.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookie/vb/HttpCookie.vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定與 Cookie 關聯的網域。

span.span: Gets or sets the domain to associate the cookie with.

value.span: 與 Cookie 關聯的網域名稱。

span.span: The name of the domain to associate the cookie with.
The default value is the current domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定`Domain`屬性會限制傳輸至要求的資源，該網域中的用戶端的 cookie。Setting the `Domain` attribute limits transmission of the cookie to clients requesting a resource from that domain. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定 cookie 的網域。The following code example sets the cookie's domain. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Domain Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Domain Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Domain Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Domain Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定 cookie 的到期時間為 10 分鐘從目前的時間。The following code example sets the expiration time of the cookie to 10 minutes from the current time. The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查每個成員的多個值的 cookie 集合。The following code example examines each member of a cookie collection for multiple values. 如果 cookie屬性是`true`，表示有多個值，這個範例會將值名稱複製到一個字串陣列和對應的值，另一個字串陣列。If a cookie's property is `true`, indicating that multiple values are present, this example copies the value names into one string array and the corresponding values into another string array. 如需如何建立多個 cookie 值的範例，請參閱。For an example of how to create multiple values for a cookie, see . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，指定 Cookie 是否由用戶端指令碼存取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a cookie is accessible by client-side script.

value.span: 如果 Cookie 有 屬性且不可以透過用戶端指令碼存取，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the cookie has the attribute and cannot be accessed through a client-side script; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Internet Explorer 6 Service Pack 1 和更新版本所支援 cookie 屬性的版本，可協助減輕導致竊取 cookie 的跨網站指令碼威脅。Microsoft Internet Explorer version 6 Service Pack 1 and later supports a cookie property, , that can help mitigate cross-site scripting threats that result in stolen cookies. 竊取的 cookie 可以包含機密資訊，識別使用者，請在站台，例如 ASP.NET 工作階段識別碼或表單驗證票證，並由偽裝成使用者，或取得機密資訊以攻擊者就可以重新執行。Stolen cookies can contain sensitive information identifying the user to the site, such as the ASP.NET session ID or forms authentication ticket, and can be replayed by the attacker in order to masquerade as the user or obtain sensitive information. 當`HttpOnly`cookie 收到相容的瀏覽器、 用戶端指令碼無法存取。When an `HttpOnly` cookie is received by a compliant browser, it is inaccessible to client-side script. > [!CAUTION] > 設定屬性設`true`不會防止攻擊者存取的網路通道直接存取 cookie。Setting the property to `true` does not prevent an attacker with access to the network channel from accessing the cookie directly. 請考慮使用 Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) 來協助防止對這。Consider using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) to help protect against this. 工作站的安全性也是重要的因為惡意使用者可以使用開啟的瀏覽器視窗或包含永續性 cookie 的電腦來取得存取權與合法使用者的身分識別的網站。Workstation security is also important, as a malicious user could use an open browser window or a computer containing persistent cookies to obtain access to a Web site with a legitimate user's identity. 如需有關可能的攻擊，以及如何減輕這些協助此屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 緩解跨網站指令碼，僅限 HTTP Cookie](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=41580)。For more information on possible attacks and how this property can help mitigate them, see [Mitigating Cross-site Scripting With HTTP-only Cookies](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=41580). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何撰寫`HttpOnly`cookie，並顯示如何不透過 ECMAScript 用戶端存取。The following code example demonstrates how to write an `HttpOnly` cookie and shows how it is not accessible by the client through ECMAScript. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpOnlyCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpOnlyCookie/CS/httponlycookiecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpOnlyCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpOnlyCookie/vb/httponlycookievb.aspx#1)]

[!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Name Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Name Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定與目前 Cookie 一起傳輸的虛擬路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the virtual path to transmit with the current cookie.

value.span: 與 Cookie 一起傳輸的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path to transmit with the cookie.

value.span: 預設為 ，也就是伺服器根目錄。

span.span: The default is , which is the server root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會擴充cookie 所套用的特定 URL，完整描述的屬性。The property extends the property to completely describe the specific URL to which the cookie applies. 例如，在 URL 的 http:/ www.microsoft.com/asp，網域是 www.microsoft.com 而路徑是 /asp。For example, in the URL http:/www.microsoft.com/asp, the domain is www.microsoft.com and the path is /asp. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將新 cookie 的屬性。The following code example sets the property of a new cookie. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Path Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Path Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Path Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Path Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Secure { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否要使用 SSL (亦即，只能透過 HTTPS) 來傳輸 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to transmit the cookie using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)--that is, over HTTPS only.

value.span: 若要透過 SSL 連線 (HTTPS) 來傳送 Cookie，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to transmit the cookie over an SSL connection (HTTPS); otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要設定的 cookie 的整個應用程式使用 SSL 傳輸，應用程式的組態檔，位於 應用程式的根目錄的 Web.config 中啟用它。To set the transmission of cookies using SSL for an entire application, enable it in the application's configuration file, Web.config, which resides in the root directory of the application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [httpCookies 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74790718-bfa3-4935-bc9a-59c88797e08f)。For more information, see [httpCookies Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74790718-bfa3-4935-bc9a-59c88797e08f). 設定值，以程式設計方式使用屬性覆寫 Web.config 檔案中設定的值。Values set programmatically using the property override values set in the Web.config file. 當處理機密資訊時，強烈建議您透過 SSL 加密，使用 HTTPS 通訊協定。When dealing with sensitive information, it is strongly recommended that you use HTTPS protocol with SSL encryption. SSL 會防止要改變的資料 （資料完整性）、 可保護使用者的身分識別 （機密性），及可確保資料來自預期的用戶端 （驗證）。SSL protects against data being altered (data integrity), protects a user's identity (confidentiality), and assures that data originates from the expected client (authentication). 如需優點加密的詳細資訊，請參閱[signature is Valid](~/docs/standard/security/cryptographic-services.md)。For more information on the benefits of encryption, see [Cryptographic Services](~/docs/standard/security/cryptographic-services.md). 如需有關如何在 Internet Information Services (IIS) Web 伺服器上設定 SSL 的詳細資訊，請參閱[網頁伺服器或網站上設定 SSL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=38553)。For more information about configuring SSL on an Internet Information Services (IIS) Web server, see [Configuring SSL on a Web Server or a Web Site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=38553). ## Examples 如果 cookie 設定為傳輸使用 SSL，所以下列程式碼範例會採取動作。The following code example takes action if the cookie is set to transmit using SSL. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Using Secure Sockets Layer

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Shareable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Shareable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 判斷 cookie 是否可以參與輸出快取。

span.span: Determines whether the cookie is allowed to participate in output caching.

value.span: 若要指定包含一個或多個輸出 Cookie 的特定 不會隱藏輸出快取則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to specify that output caching will not be suppressed for a give containing one or more outbound cookies; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果給定包含一或多個輸出 cookie設定為`false`（預設值），輸出快取將會隱藏回應。If a given contains one or more outbound cookies with is set to `false` (the default value), output caching will be suppressed for the response. 這可避免包含潛在的敏感資訊從回應中快取，並傳送至多個用戶端的 cookie。This prevents cookies that contain potentially sensitive information from being cached in the response and sent to multiple clients. 若要允許回應，其中包含快取的 cookie，設定 快取的回應，例如使用正常`OutputCache`指示詞或 MVC 的 [OutputCache] 屬性，並將所有輸出的 cookie，具有設定為`true`。To allow a response containing cookies to be cached, configure caching normally for the response, such as using the `OutputCache` directive or MVC's [OutputCache] attribute, and set all outbound cookies to have set to `true`.

[!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Values Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Values Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Values Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Values Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
